name: Lost in the Deep (Jaime)
description:
You have been selected as the principal pilot of the mythic explorer submarine of the profesor Requin. After a long exploration work, you have been find lost in the depths of the ocean. The mean light of the ship is powerless and essential part of the machine are missing and must be founds before you can return to the surface again.

This is a submission for the GGJ 2021 with the theme: "Lost and Found".

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-deep-7

Deep Inside Team:

  •  Jaime Hernández: Game Developer
  •  Sebastián Porthoz: Music/Level Design
  •  Alejandro Trejo: Code
  •  Gonzorco: Graphic design, Concept art
  •  Luis Barón: 3D modelling, UI design

Special Thanks to Gary Roberts, who help us with the 3D environment art.

Mexico, 2021
